fields.name: Lacarate (3x):
fields.value: ** Target player during the day starts bleeding, they will be hit with a 2.5x Attack Power Attack in 2 nights.

fields.name: Assassinate:
fields.value: ** Attack a player with your Attack Power

fields.name: Two for one deal (1x):
fields.value: ** Attack two players with your Attack Power

fields.name: Limited Supplies (Passive):
fields.value: ** If someone else becomes an Assassin, expended charges are not regained
